changeSet.author: Aleksander.shukurov@gmail.com
changeSet.comment: fill in the table "training_types" with test data
changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery) INSERT INTO training_types (type_name, inserted_date_at_utc, updated_date_at_utc) SELECT 'Type name' || s.sery, NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (499 - 1) + 1)) * INTERVAL '1 day' FROM series s
